places.name: Kitchen
descriptions: short:This appears to be the kitchen of the space station, and there is lots of food and water in here

places.name: Radial Thruster
description: short:The fuel and oxygen tanks look to be empty. It looks like you need to find fuel and oxygen tanks.

places.name: corridor with leak
description: short:You hear a small hissing. There might be a leak in this corridor.

places.name: canteen
descriptions: short:This appears to be the canteen of the space station. There is more food and water in here.

places.name: pantry door
description: short:There is a solid door stopping you from entering the pantry. There is likely more food, or perhaps other things, inside.

places.name: pantry
descriptions: short:This is the pantry of the space station. There are lots of reserve food stocks in here.

places.name: docking port
descriptions: short:This is the dockign port of the space station. You climbed out of
